description:
Backup schedules has been removed from the v1.1 API. We need to update nova so that v1.1 request can no longer access this controller.

Additionally. It might be good to remove backup_schedules entirely. It is unimplemented and as such could potentially confuse 1.0 API users. If the implementation stays in the v1.0 API perhaps throwing explicit not implemented exceptions would be better.
title: OSAPI: remove backup_schedule from the v1.1 API

comments.content:
Backup schedules has been removed from the v1.1 API. We need to update nova so that v1.1 request can no longer access this controller.

Additionally. It might be good to remove backup_schedules entirely. It is unimplemented and as such could potentially confuse 1.0 API users. If the implementation stays in the v1.0 API perhaps throwing explicit not implemented exceptions would be better.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dan-prince
